info.name: EOC - Dark
info.description: by grom. Dark style for folding.extremeoverclocking.com and kakaostats.com. Those are statistics websites for Folding@home project. If you want a dark style for foldingforum.org as well, try https://userstyles.org/styles/95077/phpbb-dark-blue-simple
info.additionalInfo: Posted per request. Site wrongly registered an update - "Updated Sep 24, 2014". Last update was 2013-12-10, no further updates were made, nor were they necessary. Update (2013-12-10): colored "Current" (green) and "Processing" (orange) on EOC, thank you PantherX for reporting. Update (2013-12-07): added kakaostats.com
